definition.text: The first dimension we should define is what type of strategy the hypothesis is aimed at.

paragraphs.text: A simple rule-of-thumb is determining if it is a scalping, day-trading, swing trading, or position trading strategy.
This definition provides a notion of the expected holding period, that is, the average time range expected for each position to be open.
The value of such a definition is that it provides a guideline as to what time frames to analyze to determine the existence of trends.
